# RoleShot (RP-SS-Editor)

RoleShot is a specialized web-based screenshot and chatlog editor for text-based Roleplay (RP) servers, particularly GTA World. It allows users to create cinematic RP screenshots by overlaying chatlogs onto images with advanced parsing, AI filtering, and visual effects.

- Live Version: https://roleshot.hsynadil.com
- Repository: https://github.com/hsynadil/RP-SS-Editor
- Discord: https://discord.gg/Mehpr6RY4q

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React 19 (Vite)
- Typescript
- Styling: Vanilla CSS / Tailwind (where used)
- AI: Google Gemini AI SDK (@google/genai)
- Visuals: Lucide React, HTML5 Canvas for image processing
- Deployment: Vercel

## Key Components
- `src/components/Editor`: Main workspace for image and text editing.
- `src/utils/chatParser.ts`: Logic for parsing raw RP logs into structured, color-coded lines.
- `src/services/gemini.ts`: Integration with Google Gemini for log filtering.
- `src/components/ImageRenderer.tsx`: Core engine for rendering text overlays and image adjustments onto a canvas.

## Features
- Drag & Drop / Clipboard support for images.
- Smart RP chatlog parsing (handles /me, /do, radio, phone, etc.).
- AI-powered "Magic Filter" using Gemini 1.5 Flash.
- Cinematic "Cinema Mode" and gradient overlays.
- One-click upload to ImgBB.
- Progressive Web App (PWA) support.

## Development
- `npm run dev`: Start dev server.
- `npm run build`: Production build.
- `npm run preview`: Preview production build.
